item.title: Talk about VEIN on Universidad Nacional Tecnologica de Lima Sur, Peru
item.description: I will be giving a talk about the VEIN model and its latests features on the Talk about VEIN on Universidad Nacional Tecnologica de Lima Sur, Peru. The talk will be online on July 6, 2021 at 12:00 Peruvian time.
